original_title: Sri Lanka picks 15-man squad for World Cup Qualifier
original_body_lines: The Sri Lanka Cricket Selection Committee selected the following 15-member squad to compete in the ICC Men’s Cricket World Cup Qualifier tournament to be held in Zimbabwe.
